item.title: Why we need to have a blog
item.description: Why write? Writing as crystallized thought, a way of expressing the labyrinth of interconnected, messy, and many time incoherent ideas in my mind. It is a form of knowledge distillation. I feel molding thoughts into new forms through language and terminology can give it a new perspective. I just want you to read the below post as this kuttiee suggests: https://www.henrikkarlsson.xyz/p/search-query Writing for a general public, you need to be broad and a bit bland.
